column5: Hi All,  I was looking for dam fishing in the GTA.  I have seen the Clairville Conservation Area has a dam near the 427.  Any experiences here?

According to the Guide to Eating Ontario Sport fish I produce, the reservoir contains largemouth bass, perch, rock bass, brown bull head carp and white sucker.  I have seen people fish below the dam on occasion but don't know if there's anything there.
Thanks!  I wish google earth had contour lines on its map so I can check depth/weeds/holes!  G
Anyone fish the dam in Alliston, Ont?  Was looking for a "local" place to fish near the GTA.  Any info will help!
